mapper.select: SELECT t1.pipel_trace_id, t1.job_trace_id, t1.pipel_id, t3.id as componentId, t3.component_type as componentName, t1.create_time as start_time, t2.create_time as end_time, CASE WHEN t2.msg LIKE '%运行成功%' THEN '成功' WHEN t2.msg LIKE '%运行失败%' THEN '失败' WHEN t2.msg LIKE '%跳过%' THEN '跳过' WHEN t2.msg LIKE '%禁止%' THEN '禁止' END AS result FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_pipel_job_log a WHERE a.type = 4 AND a.del_flag =1) as t1 LEFT JOIN tb_pipel_job_log t2 ON t1.job_trace_id = t2.job_trace_id AND t2.type = 5 AND t2.del_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN ${dispatchDbName}.tb_nifi_custom_workflow_detail t3 ON t1.component_id = t3.id WHERE t1.pipel_trace_id = #{pipelTraceId} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
